job.title: 100% REMOTE Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: A risk management software company is looking for a 100% remote Site Reliability Engineer and is offering up to $65/hour (contract-to-hire). This engineer is someone experienced with either Terraform, Cloudformation, or Ansible, and skilled with at least one scripting language (Powershell, Bash, Python, etc.). Someone who be comfortable joining a major Azure cloud migration project, and looking to expand their DevOps skill set (including hands-on Kubernetes/AKS builds) will fit in perfectly here! What You Will Be Doing  Tech Breakdown Daily Responsibilities The Offer Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. Gavin Malloy
